#summary Short summary of changes for the current build of the PRIDE Converter. (Note that this may not be the same as the released version.)

----

 * FEATURE IMPROVEMENT: The contents of comboboxes are now centrally aligned.
 * BUG FIX: Fixed two minor GUI bugs in the DataBase Details frame.
 * LIBRARY UPDATE: Updated utilities to version 2.9.2.
 * PRIDE XML result file is now zipped after conversion
 * NEW FEATURE: A dialog telling you to request access to the PRIDE FTP server now appear if the (unzipped) PRIDE XML files size is larger than 15 MB.
 * NEW FEATURE: Fragment Ion Annotations are now included for: ms_lims, Mascot Data Files and OMSSA.
